headerText: I am a self-taught front-end web developer. Created landing pages and websites for companies since 2017, mainly focused on HTML/CSS/JS and React. Love to write when having free time.
aboutText: I am a web developer focused on front-end technologies.
aboutDesc: Hello, I am Yuki! A front-end web developer who joined this field since 2017. Good at CSS and React/JavaScript and always searching ways to optimize my workflow.
aboutDesc1: Love to write and learning new languages. Native in Cantonese, and fluent in Japanese and English. Currently learning German. Feel free to drop me a line!

projects.name: Learning with EF Japan
projects.desc: This is a landing page developed for EF Japan, for introducing the benefits of studying with EF Japan.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are HTML, CSS, Javascript and the slider used slick.

projects.name: We Love Languages
projects.desc: This is a campaign page developed for EF Asia, for boosting awareness and sales of EF Asia offices, included EF Japan, Hong Kong, Indonesia, South Korea, Thailand, Vietnam. User need to play and match six pairs of card and the end, they can get discounts of EF's courses.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are React, SASS/CSS and webpack.

projects.name: Accent Quiz
projects.desc: This is a campaign page developed for EF China, for boosting leads and awareness of EF China. Through this quiz, user can hear and answer questions of different accents, At the end, they can know their scores.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are React, SASS/CSS, with WeChat SDK for customizing share content.

projects.name: EF Hot Deals
projects.desc: This is a promotion page developed for EF Asia, for boosting sales of EF Asia offices, included EF Japan, Hong Kong, Indonesia, South Korea, Thailand, Vietnam. Staff can switch to different theme, e.g. Christmas to show different design.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are HTML/Pug, SASS/CSS and Javascript.

projects.name: DBS Website Revamp
projects.desc: This is a campaign page developed for EF Asia, for boosting awareness and sales of EF Asia offices, included EF Japan, Hong Kong, Indonesia, South Korea, Thailand, Vietnam. User need to play and match six pairs of card and the end, they can get discounts of EF's courses.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are React, SASS/CSS.

projects.name: Hava - Weather App
projects.desc: Side project. This app can view current local weather and powered by React.js and DarkSky API. Open it and view your local weather at a glance! You can also change temperature from °F to °C degrees using the switch on top right.
projects.techDesc: The main technologies are React, SASS/CSS.

contactText: Need a project? Feel free to contact me and let me know what you need. Everything would be tailor-made and suit for your needs.
